review: My aligner treatment with Dr. Tania was highly effective in straightening my teeth. Throughout the process, Dr. Tania and her team displayed excellent professionalism, demonstrating deep knowledge and providing courteous service. Communication was clear and timely, with Dr. Tania explaining the treatment plan comprehensively and addressing any adjustments needed along the way. The aligners were generally comfortable to wear, with only minor discomfort initially. The treatment progressed according to the estimated timeline without significant delays. I received thorough support and guidance on caring for the aligners, contributing to a smooth overall experience. I am pleased with the final results of my treatment and would confidently recommend Dr. Tania for aligner treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr tania is an exceptional dentist who provides thorough and compassionate care. From my experience, the clinic was clean and welcoming, and the staff were friendly and professional. Dr. Tania took the time to explain procedures clearly and ensured I was comfortable throughout. Their attention to detail and gentle approach made the visit pleasant, alleviating any anxiety I had about dental work. I appreciate their commitment to patient education and preventive care, which is evident in their practice. Overall, I highly recommend Dr. Tania for anyone seeking a skilled dentist who prioritizes patient well-being and quality treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Wonderful experience!! loved the way she handled the situation , now i can smile out loud without any hesitation 
Back with my white and shining teeth 
All thanks to dr tania nijhawan
